turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Anna, can you please stop and get me a Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. Which store would you like me to go to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one off of 10th and 47th in Greeley will be just fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I please have a grande caffe latte, with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hot, or cold?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope that should do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I'm on my way now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Were you able to get the order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes ma'am, the order has been sent, waiting for pickup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! Let me know when you're on your way back.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: On my way back, your grande caffe latte with almond milk in hand!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect! See you soon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: See you soon.
